options.description: Set quality. This option defines the number of levels for averaging. It accepts an integer in the range 4-5. Default value is 4.
options.name: quality

options.description: Force a constant quantization parameter. It accepts an integer in range 0-63. If not set, the filter will use the QP from the video stream (if available).
options.name: qp

options.description: Set filter strength. It accepts an integer in range -15 to 32. Lower values mean more details but also more artifacts, while higher values make the image smoother but also blurrier. Default value is 0 − PSNR optimal.
options.name: strength

options.description: Enable the use of the QP from the B-Frames if set to 1. Using this option may cause flicker since the B-Frames have often larger QP. Default is 0 (not enabled).
options.name: use_bframe_qp
